meta.core_philosophy: Clarity, Motion, Confidence. Not a game, but a journey.

usage_rules: Headings must be tight: tracking-tight for all text-2xl and above.
Labels and overlines must be uppercase and wide: tracking-widest text-xs font-bold.
Body text should have relaxed leading: leading-relaxed for readability.
Do not use Inter for headings. Use Manrope for that geometric, traffic-sign clarity.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617) for darkest elements.
Primary color is for Actions (Start Test, Next Question).
Success/Error colors are for Feedback only.
Dark mode should feel like a car dashboard at night: deep greys, glowing accents.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white font-bold shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 text-slate-900 dark:text-white font-medium hover:bg-slate-200 dark:hover:bg-slate-700 transition-all
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-full text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400 hover:text-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-50 dark:hover:bg-indigo-950/30

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.base: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-950 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all

progress_bar.indicator: h-full bg-indigo-600 rounded-full transition-all duration-500 ease-out

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-900/70 border-b border-white/20 dark:border-white/5
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.

hero_background.description: Curved road with mountain view. Use for Hero Section background with overlay.

success_modal.description: Happy confident driver. Use for 'Test Passed' or 'Achievement Unlocked' modals.

abstract_texture.description: Light trails at night. Use for 'Night Drive' mode headers or abstract accents.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Road Mode' theme: High contrast, clear typography, traffic-sign colors for functional elements.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give it a modern, geometric, automotive feel.
Use 'Outfit' for body text for maximum legibility.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and micro-interactions (scale, color shift).
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Do not use placeholders.
Follow the mobile-first layout strategy: Stacked cards, bottom navigation, thumb-friendly buttons.
Use Shadcn components but customize them heavily using the provided Tailwind classes in 'components' section.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
